alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 3:05PM EST until December 24 at 6:08AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 17.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.6 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Fri 2 pm: 15.0 Forecast: Fri 1 pm MSG Fri 7 pm 17.6 Sat 1 am 16.9 Sat 7 am 15.8 Sat 1 pm 14.9 Sat 7 pm 14.1 Sun 1 am 12.8 Sun 7 am 12.5 Sun 1 pm 12.2 Sun 7 pm 12.1 Mon 1 am 12.0 Mon 7 am 11.9 &&
